subject:
Anyone with a Samba PDC and a one-way setup got time to verify a
 bug?
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Can anyone look at this today ?

'Users get "Your password expires today" in error'
  https://bugzilla.samba.org/show_bug.cgi?id=4613

Thanks.



cheers, jerry
